name: Just One More Thing!
description:
Information:

This is a prototype I threw together in a week for PigSquad's "Finish Your Game" Jam! The idea is that the player has a list of tasks they must complete in a set amount of time, and it's up to you to figure out how to best get it all done. I figured this would work well for the jam since the theme is "Cutting Corners". Not only did I join the jam late, but I spent way too long for a solo developer working on the environment.

This prototype of the game only has 2 tasks to complete, and each segment is set to only take 10 seconds. I do plan to spend some time post-jam adding in the rest of the tasks, getting the game loop tied up, and adding in some very needed sounds and music.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Shift - Jog/Run (Inside/Outside)
E - Use
TAB - View Task List
Alt+F4 - Close the game (currently no in-game menu)

!Currently on hold while I work on another game jam!
